Translations.Text: Ona je present slope zapadny mount when my issued command Moses ona nie bol svedok
My zriadit vela generations length cas (they deviated Nor je ona among the ludia z Midyan reciting our revelations them! My robi send posol)
(Nor je ona slope Mount Sinai when my vola sa Moses it bol zlutovanie tvoj Lord ludia) v poradie warn ludia nie received warner ona ze they berie heed
Thus they nie say when disaster strikes them mat rad consequence ich own cin Our Lord had Ona sent posol us my nasledovat Tvoj revelations bol believers

Ihned ze truth pojdem them us they said len my dat co dat Moses they nie disbelieve v je Robit co dat Moses v the minuly? They said Both (scriptures) je robota z kuzlo ze copied jeden iny They i said My bol disbelievers both z them
Say Potom produce scripture z GOD lepsi guidance than 2 ja nasledovat it ona bol truthful
they zlyhat respond ona potom zauzlit lenze they nasledovat len ich own nazor. Kto bol daleko astray than those nasledovat ich own nazor guidance z GOD GOD NIE guide such ZLOMYSELNY LUDIA
